metadata.name: Sysmon Driver Unloaded Via Fltmc.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects possible Sysmon filter driver unloaded via fltmc.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\fltmc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('fltmc.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unload')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sysmon')))

output.summary: Detects possible Sysmon filter driver unloaded via fltmc.exe
